title: Problem 2147_C
statement: You have n flower pots arranged in a line numbered from 1 to n left to right. Some of the pots contain flowers, while others are empty. You are given a binary string s describing which pots contain flowers (s_i = 1) and which are empty (s_i = 0). You also have some rabbits, and you want to take a nice picture of rabbits and flowers. You want to put rabbits in every empty pot (s_i = 0), and for each rabbit, you can put it looking either to the left or to the right. Unfortunately, the rabbits are
